summary: This is a brief email from a contractor to US Attorney Geoffrey Berman, notifying him that Mary Jo is arriving for a 1pm meeting regarding her representation of an individual (name redacted) in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient of the email, being notified of Mary Jo's arrival for a meeting related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Mary Jo
persons.context: Coming in for a 1pm meeting regarding her representation of a client in the Epstein case.

connections.description: Mary Jo is scheduled to meet with US Attorney Geoffrey Berman regarding her representation in the Epstein case.
Mary Jo is representing an individual (name redacted as 'Mk n') in the Epstein case.

events.title: Scheduled meeting regarding Epstein case representation
events.description: Mary Jo is scheduled to come in at 1pm for a meeting with US Attorney Geoffrey Berman in connection with her representation of a client in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An attorney named Mary Jo was representing a client (name partially redacted) in the Epstein case as of July 2019.
US Attorney Geoffrey Berman was involved in scheduling or holding meetings related to the Epstein case in July 2019.
The email indicates ongoing legal activity and attorney-client representation in the Epstein case during the summer of 2019.
